landing.page.sender.heading: Share with <1/> Confidence
landing.page.sender.paragraph: You've swallowed a planet! All I've got to do is pass as an ordinary human being. Simple.
landing.page.sender.rain.heading: Drop ‘em!
landing.page.sender.rain.text: Drop files or folders anywhere on this window to share them

uploading.page.sender.heading: Uploading files
success.page.sender.heading: Awesome!
success.page.sender.description: Your recipients will soon receive an email with file download link and password (if set).
analyzing.page.virus.detected_one: {{count}} of your file may be harmful, we can’t send this file. Please edit your transfer and try again.
analyzing.page.virus.detected_other: {{count}} of your files may be harmful, we can’t send these files. Please edit your transfer and try again.
landing.page.receiver.heading: Get your assets moving
landing.page.receiver.paragraph: Powerfully simple file transfer — designed with and for advertising people. We’re building a fast, precise and secure tool that will change how your campaigns go live.
landing.page.receiver.sub.paragraph: What’s next? Platform integrations, rich asset preview, file QC, AI creative analytics and more…
